{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3052453,"name":"Timothy Waldin","username":"twaldin","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/t/94ad74/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-04-26T01:44:24.833Z","cooked":"

My team is looking into buying a CNC router for next season, we have a budget of around $10000 for the machine. I have seen many posts about Velox but from what I can tell, they are closed. I have looked at the MR1 from Langmuir Systems but it seems too small, and I have looked at the ShopSabre23 but it‚Äôs really pricey. Our only real requirement is that we want the cut size to be at least 3‚Äôx2‚Äô and obviously we want rigidity. What would you recommend?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2022-04-26T01:44:24.833Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":198,"reads":372,"readers_count":371,"score":1064.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":410224,"topic_slug":"budget-cnc-router-10k","display_username":"Timothy Waldin","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/t/help-me-buy-the-right-shop-upgrades-for-75k/467017/38","internal":true,"reflection":true,"title":"Help me buy the right shop upgrades for $75k","clicks":0}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":52801,"hidden":false,"trust_level":0,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Mech Lead 8840"},"post_url":"/t/budget-cnc-router-10k/410224/1","custom_user_title":"Mech Lead 8840","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3052455,"name":"","username":"mdurrani834","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/mdurrani834/{size}/131246_2.png","created_at":"2022-04-26T01:46:22.713Z","cooked":"
WestCoast Products

Omio CNC & Accessories

WestCoast Products

Price: USD 3,999.99

How much does losing 6in on Y and 2in on X matter? This is one of the most highly recommended routers in FRC and will be able to handle anything you throw at it.

We purchased a shopsabre 23 for about $10k in 2020 and it has been very good so far. I‚Äôd recommend looking into it.

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2022-04-26T02:05:52.381Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":6,"reads":323,"readers_count":322,"score":124.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":410224,"topic_slug":"budget-cnc-router-10k","display_username":"AllenGregoryIV","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":true,"admin":false,"staff":true,"user_id":10647,"hidden":false,"trust_level":4,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Engineering Coach - Spectrum 3847/Photon 8515"},"post_url":"/t/budget-cnc-router-10k/410224/4","custom_user_title":"Engineering Coach - Spectrum 3847/Photon 8515","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3052486,"name":"Anshul Bajaj","username":"anshul","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/anshul/{size}/156934_2.png","created_at":"2022-04-26T02:08:11.220Z","cooked":"

I am a huge ShopSabre Fan. We do all of our router work on the ShopSabre RC in my garage, and Poofs do all of their routing on a PRO 408 iirc.

But, for FRC, the omio is the best value. RC‚Äôs enclosure + cart + omio combo is hard to beat for the price. Though If you can spring for a 23, I would go for it over the omio (better software, support, US made, etc).

I‚Äôll throw in for the Omio X8 2200 USB. We bought one last year and it has proven to be an incredibly simple and robust machine. Very accurate, easy to maintain, and very powerful for it‚Äôs size. It‚Äôs upped our parts manufacturing abilities by lightyears. All that, and it‚Äôs still only about $4000. That‚Äôs hard to beat.
